liquibase.ChangeSet

liquibase.ChangeSet Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Encapsulates a changeSet and all its associated changes.

List<Change> liquibase.ChangeSet.getChanges (  ) 

Returns an unmodifiable list of changes.

To add one, use the addRefactoing method.
